typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	P_DWH_FILE_NAME as string
}
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		Course_name as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		Location as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Country as string,
		Size as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcStageOLAC
SrcStageOLAC derive({Year of birth} = iif(toInteger({Year of birth}) < year(currentUTC()), '', {Year of birth}),
		{} = 'OLAC/'+replace($P_DWH_FILE_NAME, '.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMdd_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DWHOLAC
